summary: Requiem 1.8 patch for Faction Crossbows by Deserter X
descriptionHtml:
Requiem 1.8 patch for Faction Crossbows by Deserter X

Damage, draw speed, weight, and prices have been adjusted based on the crossbow's material to match Requiem's values. Crossbows have Requiem's default 20% armor piercing. Crafted bolts are tagged as armor piercing ammo based on material. Steel crossbows (Imperial and Stormcloak) are tagged as breakable.

[u]Installation:[/u]
Use NMM, MO, or just extract Requiem - Faction Crossbows.esp into your Skyrim/Data folder.

[u]Load order:[/u]
Use LOOT or place Requiem - Faction Crossbows.esp after Requiem and Faction Crossbows and before Requiem for the Indifferent.

Skyrim.esm
....
....
....
Faction Crossbows.esp
....
Requiem.esp
....
Requiem - Faction Crossbows.esp
....
Bashed Patch, 0.esp                    <--- if you use Wrye Bash
Requiem for the Indifferent.esp


[u]Credits/Thanks:[/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/?]Requiem[/url]: Ogerboss and Xarrian
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58704/?]Faction Crossbows[/url]: Deserter X
author: spikyfishy

files.name: Requiem - Faction Crossbows v1.02
files.changelogHtml: Applied gravity/speed fixes to non-enchanted bolts. Thanks to meltyc.
